name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 9
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Announcing the Aurelia Discourse and New Site Experience!
posts.description: Today, we're thrilled to announce that we've launched the official Aurelia Discourse forum [https://discourse.aurelia.io]! At the same time, we've completely overhauled our site [http://aurelia.io/] and documentation technology, opening the way for better docs and learning to come.

posts.name: Aurelia at Techdays The Netherlands
posts.description: Techdays The Netherlands is just two days away! There's some great Aurelia content for you, if you are attending this event. Read on to learn more about the upcoming talks.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Early October 2017
posts.description: We've just made a massive set of releases to Aurelia's core libraries and plugins. This set of releases includes perf optimizations, reduced memory utilization, removal of a memory leak, plenty of fixed bugs and adds some new features!

posts.name: Case Study: Ivee 3D Editor - Aurelia+Azure+ASP.NET+Redux+ThreeJS
posts.description: Today, I'm pleased to introduce you to Daniel Radu. Dan is a member of our Aurelia community who has been building some pretty awesome stuff by combining Aurelia [http://aurelia.io] with Microsoft Azure [https://azure.microsoft.com]. I'll let Dan tell you about his experiences, in his own words...

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Late August 2017
posts.description: We've got a number of bug fixes, enhancements and perf improvements this time around. In particular, we've made some substantial fixes to our CLI Webpack support.

posts.name: Aurelia CLI Webpack Update!
posts.description: Today, I'm thrilled to announce that we've added support for Webpack 3 to the Aurelia CLI. With this addition, the CLI supports project generation equally for Webpack, SystemJS and RequireJS.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Mid August 2017
posts.description: Today, we have a small set of release to update you with. We're gearing up for some big releases next. Stay tuned for more...
